Compute standardized logFC-style effect sizes from Was2CoDE output

was2code_lfc.Rd

Compute standardized logFC-style effect sizes from Was2CoDE output

Usage

was2code_lfc(dist_list, case_idx, control_idx)

Arguments

dist_list

A list of distance arrays (from was2code_dist)

case_idx

Integer vector of row indices corresponding to cases

control_idx

Integer vector of row indices corresponding to controls

Value

A matrix with genes as rows and distance components as columns: columns = c("was2", "location", "size", "shape")
